titleStmt.title: A list of the præbendaries of the cathedral church of St. Paul's, London, appointed by the Lords Commissioners for the diocess of London, to preach upon the holy-days in the year of our Lord, 1688. at Saint Peter's Church in Cornhill.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of London.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
